name: Fundraise.com
description: http://t.co/uLCBaXidvp helps individuals and organizations of all shapes and sizes raise money online. Start #fundraising today.

apis.name: Fundraise.com
apis.description: Fundraise.com provides a RESTful API that exposes the majority of the data and actions available to each user account via a JSON interface. Incoming data can be sent as a POST or as JSON provided the mime-type of application/json is sent in the request headers. Most actions are performed on either an organization or a fundraiser. All fundraisers are scoped beneath organizations.
